item.title: Why I Switched from Wordpress to Hugo
item.author: admin@andrewrgoss.com (Andrew Goss)
item.description: For a long time I’ve believed in the importance of having a blog but struggled to keep one going. I started out using Blogger back in the day and most recently was using Wordpress. But there were features about these blogging platforms that consistently bugged me. Fortunately for me, while I was learning the Go programming language I stumbled across Hugo, a static site generator written in this language.
